author: hship
msg: - More changes to survive RemoteException failures.
- Start applying the Primix-branded look and feel.
- Switch from ObjectMessage to MailMessage for the MailQueueBean.

author: hship
msg: Change jBoss.mk to compile using the ejb2.0.jar.

author: hship
msg: Simplify the Browser, to match the upcoming UI.
Lots of small changes to make the application robust, even when jBoss bounces.

author: hship
msg: Include the web directory in the full distribution.
Convert ExceptionAnalyzer to not use the GNU Regexp framework.
